item.dc:creator: @nerd123456789 ...nerd123456789
item.description:
@nerd123456789 wrote:

hi can you make a command like ::smoke then it does the glas blowing animation base:project insanity

if (playerCommand.equals(“test”);
if (c.inWild())
c.sendMessage(“you cannot do this in wilderness”);
return;
c.startAnim(3068); ------->this is the error when i compile whats the code for pi?
}
i tried it but it didn’t work can someone help me?
